edu.gcu.cst341.interfaces

Interface iBankActions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Account, Checking, Loan, Saving

    public interface iBankActions
    Interface containing methods for banking actions

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static int DEPOSIT
      These constants are provided as descriptors for transType in processTransaction DEPOSIT and WITHDRAWAL should be different values from TRANSFER_D and TRANSFER_W

      void doTransaction(int transType, double amount)
      interface method for processing a transaction as a deposit (or loan payment) or withdrawal

    • Field Detail

      • DEPOSIT

        static final int DEPOSIT
        These constants are provided as descriptors for transType in processTransaction DEPOSIT and WITHDRAWAL should be different values from TRANSFER_D and TRANSFER_W
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • doTransaction

        void doTransaction(int transType,
                   double amount)
        interface method for processing a transaction as a deposit (or loan payment) or withdrawal
        Parameters:
        transType - multiplier so doTransaction can process deposits and withdrawals (-1 for withdrawal or +1 for deposit)
        amount - the amount of the attempted transaction
